Rapat Komisi, Menteri Terawan Tak Terbiasa Hadapi Anggota DPR
05 Nov 2019, 17:56 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Meski terbiasa menghadapi pasien di rumah sakit dan dokter-dokter lain, Menteri Kesehatan Terawan Agus Putranto ternyata belum terbiasa menghadapi rapat DPR.(CNN Indonesia/Andry Novelino)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Meski terbiasa menghadapi pasien di rumah sakit dan dokter-dokter lain, Menteri Kesehatan Terawan Agus Putranto ternyata belum terbiasa menghadapi rapat DPR. Untuk pertama kalinya, Menteri Kesehatan Terawan Agus Putranto mengikuti rapat kerja perdana dengan Komisi IX DPR yang digelar di Kompleks MPR/DPR, Senayan, Jakarta, Selasa (4/11).Dalam rapat kerja ini Terawan memperkenalkan para pejabat Kementerian Kesehatan yang dibawanya mengikuti Raker di Komisi IX. Namun terlihat sangat gugup saat berbicara di depan puluhan anggota Komisi IX tersebut. Suara Terawan yang awalnya keras lama-lama mengecil. Melihat kejadian itu, salah satu anggota Komisi IX menginterupsinya. Dia bertanya apakah Terawan sedang sakit karena suaranya makin mengecil. "Mohon izin pimpinan, pak menteri lagi sakit?" kata salah satu anggota dewan itu.Melihat interupsi itu, Terawan lantas menghentikan perkenalan jajarannya. Ia mengatakan tidak sedang sakit, namun hanya sebatas gerogi saat pertama kali ikut rapat kerja dengan DPR"Oh saya tidak [sakit], hanya bergetar saja di depan (Raker Komisi IX)," kata Terawan.Sontak jawaban Terawan itu membuat seluruh anggota Komisi IX dan pejabat kementerian yang hadir tertawa terbahak-bahak.Setelah itu, salah satu anggota dewan lainnya turut interupsi. Ia lantas meledek Terawan hanya terbiasa berhadapan dengan para pasien ketimbang mengikuti rapat bersama anggota dewan. Sebelum jadi Menteri Kesehatan, Terawan sendiri berprofesi sebagai dokter spesialis syaraf sebelum menjabat sebagai Menteri Kesehatan. Terakhir, Mantan purnawirawan jendral bintang tiga itu mengembang amanah sebagai Direktur RSPAD Gatot Subroto."Karena biasa menghadapi pasien, anggap saja pasien bapak biar tidak grogi, microphone-nya di dekatkan saja Pak," kata dia.Melihat anjuran itu, Terawan lantas mendekatkan mikrofon yang ada diatas mejanya agar lebih dekat dengan mulutnya saat berbicara. Ia lantas melontarkan kembali candaannya kalau baru pertama kali melihat mikrofon berukuran kecil yang ada di ruangan rapat Komisi IX"Terimakasih, maafkan kami, karena kami juga baru pertama sekali melihat mic [sekecil] ini," canda Terawan.Melihat canda Terawan itu, seluruh ruangan Komisi IX bergemuruh tawa kembali.Setelah ituz Terawan lalu melanjutkan paparannya terkait visi misi Presiden Jokowi di bidang kesehatan. Terawan mengatakan Jokowi memiliki tiga fokus di bidang kesehatan selama lima tahun kedepan."Yang misi pertama mengenai penanganan stunting, kedua mengenai jaminan kesehatan nasional menbantu defisit Jaminan Kesehatan Nasional (JKN), ketiga mengenai tingginya harga obat dan penggunaan alat kesehatan produksi nasional yang belum terpakai secara maksimal. Itulah visi misi Bapak presiden untuk bidang kesehatan," ukata Terawan.  (rzr/chs)

Commission Meeting, Minister Terawan Not Accustomed to Facing DPR Members
05 Nov 2019, 17:56 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Although accustomed to dealing with patients in hospitals and other doctors, Minister of Health Terawan Agus Putranto was not yet accustomed to facing DPR meetings. (CNN Indonesia / Andry Novelino)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - Although accustomed to dealing with patients in hospitals and other doctors, Minister of Health Terawan Agus Putranto was not yet accustomed to facing DPR meetings. For the first time, Minister of Health Terawan Agus Putranto attended the inaugural working meeting with the House of Representatives Commission IX which was held at the MPR / DPR Complex, Senayan, Jakarta, Tuesday (4/11). In this work meeting Terawan introduced the Ministry of Health officials who were brought to the Working Meeting at Commission IX. But it looks very nervous when speaking in front of dozens of members of the Commission IX. Terawan's voice, which was originally loud, gradually diminished. Seeing the incident, a member of Commission IX interrupted him. He asked if Terawan was sick because his voice was getting smaller. "Please ask for permission from the leadership, Minister, are you ill?" said one member of the council. Seeing the interruption, Terawan then stopped introducing his staff. He said he was not sick, but only limited when he first joined a working meeting with the DPR "Oh I am not [sick], just shaking in front (Raker Commission IX)," Terawan said. Suddenly Terawan's answer made all members of Commission IX and ministry officials in attendance burst out laughing. After that, one of the other board members also interrupted. He then teased Terawan only accustomed to dealing with patients rather than attending meetings with council members. Before becoming Minister of Health, Terawan himself worked as a neurologist before serving as Minister of Health. Finally, the former retired three-star general expands his mandate as Director of the Gatot Subroto Army Hospital. "Since he is accustomed to dealing with patients, just consider the patient's father to be nervous, the microphone is brought closer, sir," he said. on his desk to be closer to his mouth when talking. He then hurled back his joke if it was the first time he saw a small microphone in the Commission IX meeting room. "Thank you, sorry, because we are also the first time seeing a mic [this small]," joked Terawan. Commission IX roared into laughter again. After that Terawan then continued his presentation related to President Jokowi's vision and mission in the field of health. Terawan said Jokowi had three focuses in the health sector over the next five years. "The first mission was dealing with stunting, the second was on national health insurance helping the National Health Insurance (JKN) deficit, the third was about high drug prices and the use of unused national production medical devices. "That's the vision and mission of the President for the health sector," said Terawan. (rzr / chs)
